question: With reference to Atal Bihari Vajpayee, which among the following is NOT a correct statement?
option1: He was one of the founders of Bhartiya Jan Sangh
option2: He served as political secretary to Dr. Syama Prasad Mookerjee
option3: He is the first person to deliver a speech to the United Nations General Assembly in Hindi.
option4: All the above are correct statements
answer: He was one of the founders of Bhartiya Jan Sangh
explanation: The first statement is not correct. Bhartiya Jan Sangh was founded by Dr. Syama Prasad Mookerjee.
